posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: How would you calculate gear ratios. I am working on the Zero To Autonomous swerve drive and we are using the standard 8.16/1 mk3 swerve modules. I need the turning gears and drive gears, and I am lost.

link_counts.title: MK3 Swerve Module – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked:
I found this in the SDS library but can’t understand it

public final class SdsModuleConfigurations {

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: I suspect that those numbers are the individual gears in the train for the swerve module

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: Steering ratio is given in the link as well, “The steering gear ratio of the MK3 is 12.8:1”

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: Oh yeah, i see that now. However I am still stuck on how to get those numbers into the gearRatio constants.

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: I would just create constants, 1 for drive and 1 for turn, of the right values, 12.8 and 8.67, respectively. Then when you want to convert motor rotations to wheel rotations, just divide by the right constant. And if you want to reverse the calculation, just multiply, to convert wheel rotations to motor rotations

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: or do the math in line for the drive, to be more accurate

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: Okay so in the template I sent, you would make the DriveMotorGearRatio = 1 / 8.67 and the TurningMotorGearRatio = 1 / 12.8 ?

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: Okay thank you so much. I do wonder how you got the 8.67 value though?

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: oh I misremembered the value, I think it is 8.16, whatever SDS says for the module you bought

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: oh okay, glad I asked. Would have been a nightmare troubleshooting.

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: haha yeah, we had to re-calibrate our swerve a few times as the wheel tread degraded, that would have been rough

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: Yeah, anyway thanks again man and gl on your season

posts.name: Jacob Frye
posts.cooked: you too! what team are you on?

posts.name: Josh Buker
posts.cooked: Oh i should probably put that on my profile but we are Metal Mallards 4962
